document_data.name: ''Belt of Bodily Health''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Belts of bodily health''''' were enchanted girdles imbued with health-fortifying magics.
document_data.Description: ''Belts of bodily health'' appeared to be simple leather [[belt]]s with a large hexagonal buckle.
document_data.Powers: ''Belts of bodily health'' possessed enchantments that improved the wearer's vigor, making them tougher, and healthier.
